TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何填滿關閉路徑的內部。

span.span: Specifies how the interior of a closed path is filled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會使用兩種填滿模式的其中一個路徑的內部填滿： 替代或捲曲。An application fills the interior of a path using one of two fill modes: alternate or winding. 模式決定如何填滿和裁剪內部的封閉的圖表。The mode determines how to fill and clip the interior of a closed figure. 預設模式是替代。The default mode is Alternate. 若要判斷內部的封閉圖形中的替代模式，在路徑外，顯然某個時間點從任何路徑中的任意開始點繪製一條線。To determine the interiors of closed figures in the alternate mode, draw a line from any arbitrary start point in the path to some point obviously outside the path. 如果行跨越路徑區段數目為奇數，起始點是在關閉的區域，因此填滿或裁剪區域的一部分。If the line crosses an odd number of path segments, the starting point is inside the closed region and is therefore part of the fill or clipping area. 偶數個交叉表示的點不填滿或裁剪區域中。An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped. 填滿開放的圖表，或使用連線的最後一個點的第一個點的圖列裁剪。An open figure is filled or clipped by using a line to connect the last point to the first point of the figure. 線圈模式會考慮每個交集處的路徑區段的方向。The Winding mode considers the direction of the path segments at each intersection. 它將另一個用於每個順時針旋轉的交集，並減去另一個用於每個以逆時針算起的交集。It adds one for every clockwise intersection, and subtracts one for every counterclockwise intersection. 如果結果為非零，點會視為填滿效果或裁剪區域的內部。If the result is nonzero, the point is considered inside the fill or clip area. 零計數表示這個點位於填滿效果或裁剪區域外。A zero count means that the point lies outside the fill or clip area. 圖視為順時針或逆時針根據此圖中的區段會在其中繪製的順序。A figure is considered clockwise or counterclockwise based on the order in which the segments of the figure are drawn. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個開放的圖表 （弧形） 和一個封閉的圖形 （橢圓形） 的路徑。The following example creates a path that has one open figure (an arc) and one closed figure (an ellipse). FillPath 方法填滿的路徑，根據預設的填滿模式，也就是 Alternate.The 下列圖例顯示的範例程式碼的輸出。The FillPath method fills the path according to the default fill mode, which is Alternate.The following illustration shows the output of the example code. 請注意，路徑會填滿 （根據替代） 如同開放的圖表已關閉直線從其結束點至它的起點。Note that the path is filled (according to Alternate) as if the open figure were closed by a straight line from its ending point to its starting point. ![填入開啟路徑](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "填入開啟路徑")![Fill Open Path](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "Fill Open Path") 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Alternate = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Winding = int32(1)
